scripts.build: rm -rf server/dist && npm -w client run build -- --emptyOutDir --outDir ../server/dist
scripts.build:staging: rm -rf server/dist && npm -w client run build:staging -- --emptyOutDir --outDir ../server/dist
scripts.build:production: rm -rf server/dist && npm -w client run build:production -- --emptyOutDir --outDir ../server/dist
scripts.preview: npm run build --mode=${npm_config_mode} && npm -w server start
scripts.deploy:patch: npm version --workspaces patch && git add **/package.json package-lock.json && npm version patch --include-workspace-root --force
scripts.deploy:minor: npm version --workspaces minor && git add **/package.json package-lock.json && npm version minor --include-workspace-root --force
scripts.deploy:major: npm version --workspaces major && git add **/package.json package-lock.json && npm version major --include-workspace-root --force
scripts.postdeploy: git push origin main --tags && git switch staging && git merge origin main && git push
scripts.predeploy: git switch main && git pull origin main --rebase --tags && git merge origin staging
